name: Cards and Spiders
description:
This was our first attempt at a Game Jam game, we weren't able to finish it but we thought we should still publish it.

Unfortunately it's probably not possible to finish the goal of this game.

You have a hand of 4 Cards (randomly dealt from 8 different cards, duplicates possible) and with the press of a button a random card's effect gets used, the card is thrown out of the hand and you draw a new one. 

Aim of the game is to rid the beautiful forest of the gigantic Spider inhabiting it

Walk with WASD, press SPACE to use a Card
